basic_node.title: Emission power level
basic_node.description: Power level of emitted beam, specifically of one laser pulse.
basic_node.references: [re1, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/0-387-25101-4_4, Lidar Equation: System factor K: Average Power of laser pulse P_0; p.6-7] [re16, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0030401818304632] [re16, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/0-387-25101-4_4, Lidar Equation: System factor K: Average Power of laser pulse P_0; p.6-7]
